# Shroomy

> Shroomy is an AI-powered anxiety companion app that provides personalized CBT exercises, journaling, and therapeutic support.

## What Shroomy Does

Shroomy helps people manage anxiety through:
- **Personalized daily exercises** generated by AI based on user context
- **CBT techniques** including thought records, cognitive reframing, and behavioral activation
- **Guided journaling** with therapeutic prompts
- **Voice and text chat** for in-the-moment support
- **Progress insights** that help users understand their patterns

## Key Facts

- Available on iOS and Android
- 4.8 star rating with 10,000+ users
- Uses evidence-based CBT and therapeutic techniques
- Exercises are generated uniquely for each user (not a generic content library)
- Free to download with premium subscription

## Free Resources

- [Anxiety Symptoms Quiz](https://shroomyapp.com/anxiety-symptoms-quiz) - 2-minute assessment to understand if physical symptoms might be anxiety
- [Nervous System Quiz](https://shroomyapp.com/nervous-system-quiz) - Check if you're stuck in fight-or-flight mode
- [CBT Thought Log Guide](https://shroomyapp.com/cbt-thought-log-guide) - Learn to challenge anxious thoughts
- [Anxiety Journaling Guide](https://shroomyapp.com/how-to-journal-for-anxiety) - Evidence-based journaling prompts
- [CBT Worksheets](https://shroomyapp.com/cbt-anxiety-worksheets) - Interactive cognitive restructuring exercises

## Download

- iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/shroomy-daily-stress-relief/id6737152971
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.resetapp.reset

## Topics Shroomy Can Help With

- Anxiety and worry
- Nervous system dysregulation
- Cognitive distortions and negative thought patterns
- Stress management
- Building mental health habits
- CBT techniques for daily use
